Been taking a bit of a break from social media, but alls good! Thank you for all the dms and texts. Ive been painting, reading, bettering the world around me as best I can. Heres a closeup of Miss Attie, my latest commission https://t.co/0agZNScBrG
@okiecorri Thats so close!!!
@SirEviscerate thank you so much, Ray. You are a wonderful friend who deserves wonderful things
@UptownRocketTom Aaahhh!!! Yay!!!
@katewhiteshark Im so glad you like them
@trumpetcake Thank YOU!
@ItsLLBee Her wings look like gold lam
RT @whatmaddness: Dark energy pushes the universe to expand faster and faster. Unspooling from a seemingly endless roll of both nothingness
RT @whatmaddness: Violently wiggling and shaking my body hard enough so that my muscles and ligaments scrub at my skeleton like a car wash.

Composition and basic values blocked in on this piece. Its still early in the process for this painting, but Im really excited about this one. Its about the anxiety of being perceived as worthy and is part of an exhibition Im creating called Alive But Changed https://t.co/gWSMKnrCs3
@Browtweaten adam you sweetie
@BrianGurien hey Brian! Im not making prints of that piece, but I will put it on my list to make more capybara art
@Tofireguy @trumpetcake For international shipments, I just stick stamps on my flat pack mailers so that i can keep shipping free. Its usually about $5-$6.
@ItsBeardoWeirdo @trumpetcake That smile
@ItsBeardoWeirdo @trumpetcake That is so generous of you! My Venmo is https://t.co/mby83fmhN9 and PayPal is https://t.co/H66JpDjvew. Your babe is so beautiful. Mine turns 16 this year
@tschnor Hell yeah!! Let me know how they like it!
@Lissielys
@bornmiserable I need to buy you a trophy for being my #1 hype man
@wyrm__wraith Aaah!!! Thank you! Im really excited about how its shaping up
@katewhiteshark Kate you sweet angel. Its only about 20% done, but I can dm you when its finished if youre serious!!
Progress report https://t.co/jbvaQZQFAp

@willsmith I ended up making a slurry and shooting it like a water gun into her mouth. No one is happy here tonight. Hopefully she gets with the program in the next few days

Me: *dutifully hiding pills in yogurt, some pumpkin, rice, a banana, some salmon, some butter* Penny: *tying a napkin around her neck as she spits out the pill and looks at me eagerly for her next course*
the dexterity with which my dog eats the food ~around~ her pills is incredible. shes had a full 10-course tasting menu tonight.

@nick_kaufman Im so glad you like it! The original sold, but I post new work on my website (almost) daily https://t.co/ppg1o0F9ov

@munificentbob So true!!! I was out in the world for 5 hours today and Im absolutely fried
I dont get out much so these are my I drive and I go to the grocery store tweets.

Experienced a moment of unbridled joy as a man in a pickup truck, driving aggressively to pass EVERYONE, got trapped behind and between a bunch of people who all joined forces to make him slow the f dowb. Chefs kiss. Love to see it.
Just went into an absolute fugue state while grocery shopping to prepare for the big snow storm this weekend and Im excited to eat *checks bags* cheese and cereal for 5 days straight.
Excuse me look at these little sun rays https://t.co/4Pgtkbc4Yp

@ddub1314 Hey Dylan! It is for sale. Its on a 24 hour hold for my fanhouse peeps (they get first dibs as a perk for subscribing.) if youre interested, you can snag the code on my FH for $5 (https://t.co/OyCxcBHmjI) or wait until tmrw pm when its live for everyone! https://t.co/DlhFhlfPJj

@DankAndDonuts For alla primas (the paintings I do in one sitting) Ill work on them anywhere from 1-4 hours! Anything over that and it starts getting muddy and overworked. This dude was a bit over 2 hours
And yeah, Van Gogh really painted a skeleton smokin! 1885. An absolute visionary https://t.co/uJoOKyHTNd
